contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses|It's a Mystery (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = It's a Mystery | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band]] | Cover = Bob Seger - It's a Mystery.jpg | Released = October 24, 1995 | Recorded = ??? | Genre = [[Rock and roll|Rock]] | Length = 49:49 | Label = [[Capitol Records|Capitol]] | Producer = [[Bob Seger]] | | Last album = ''[[Greatest Hits (Bob Seger album)|Greatest Hits]]'' <br /> (1994) | This album = '''''It's a Mystery''''' <br /> (1995) | Next album = ''[[Greatest Hits 2 (Bob Seger album)|Greatest Hits 2]]'' <br /> (2003) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|3|5}}<ref>{{Allmusic |class=album |id=r226733 |tab=review |label=Bob Seger & the Silver Bullet Band: ''It's a Mystery'' > Review |first=William |last=Ruhlmann |accessdate={{date|2011-07-04|dmy}} }}</ref> }} '''''It's a Mystery''''' is the fifteenth [[studio album]] by [[United States|American]] [[singer-songwriter]] [[Bob Seger]], released in 1995 (see [[1995 in music]]). Despite hit singles and fan favorites such as "Lock and Load," "Manhattan," and "Hands in the Air," the album charted at #27 on The Billboard charts. This was Seger's lowest chart position since 1976's ''[[Live Bullet]]'' which charted at #34 on the Billboard 200. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | all_writing = Bob Seger, except where noted | writing_credits = yes | | title1 = Rite of Passage | length1 = 3:51 | title2 = Lock and Load | writer2 = [[Craig Frost]], [[Tim Mitchell]], Seger | length2 = 4:55 | title3 = By the River | length3 = 3:26 | title4 = Manhattan | length4 = 5:22 | title5 = I Wonder | length5 = 4:06 | title6 = It's a Mystery | length6 = 4:18 | title7 = Revisionism Street | writer7 = Frost, Mitchell, Seger | length7 = 3:48 | title8 = Golden Boy | length8 = 2:25 | title9 = I Can't Save You Angeline | length9 = 3:56 | title10 = 16 Shells from a Thirty-Ought Six | writer10 = [[Tom Waits]] | length10 = 4:20 | title11 = West of the Moon | length11 = 4:37 | title12 = Hands in the Air | writer12 = Frost, Mitchell, Seger | length12 = 4:45 }} ==Personnel== *Bob Seger - [[synthesizer]], [[Steel-string guitar|acoustic guitar]], [[guitar]], [[piano]], [[bass guitar|bass]], [[Singing|vocals]], [[drum machine]] *[[Kenny Aronoff]] - [[Drum kit|drums]] *Eddie Bayers - drums *[[Roy Bittan]] - piano *George Bohannon - [[trombone]] *[[Rosemary Butler]] - background vocals *Chris Campbell - bass *Sam Clayton - [[maraca]]s *[[Scott Crago]] - drums *Laura Creamer - background vocals *[[Craig Frost]] - [[synthesizer]], [[keyboard instrument|keyboard]], [[electric piano]], drum machine *Donny Gerrard - background vocals *[[Bob Glaub]] - bass *[[Richard Hayward]] - drums *[[Russ Kunkel]] - drums *[[Gary Mallaber]] - drums, brushes *[[Tim Mitchell]] - guitar, [[rhythm guitar]] *[[Shaun Murphy (singer)|Shaun Murphy]] - background vocals *Buell Neidlinger - bass *[[Bill Payne]] - synthesizer *[[Alto Reed]] - [[baritone saxophone]] *Rudy Richman - [[percussion instrument|percussion]] *Tom Roady - maracas *[[Harry Stinson]] - drums *[[Fred Tackett]] - guitar *Michael Thompson - guitar *Jeffrey C.J. Vanston - synthesizer, keyboard *[[Rick Vito]] - [[slide guitar]] *Julia Waters - background vocals *Luther Waters - background vocals *Oren Waters - background vocals ==Production== *Producer: [[Bob Seger]] *Engineer: [[David N. Cole]] *Mixing: [[David N. Cole]] *Drum programming: [[Bob Seger]] ==Charts== '''Album''' - [[Billboard magazine|Billboard]] (North America) {| border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 width="550px" !align="left"|Year !align="left"|Chart !align="left"|Position |- |align="left"|1995 |align="left"|The Billboard 200 |align="left"|27 |- |} '''Singles''' - Billboard (North America) {| border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 width="550px" !align="left"|Year !align="left"|Single !align="left"|Chart !align="left"|Position |- |align="left"|1995 |align="left"|"Lock and Load" |align="left"|Mainstream Rock Tracks |align="left"|22 |- |align="left"|1996 |align="left"|"Hands in the Air" |align="left"|Mainstream Rock Tracks |align="left"|29 |- |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Bob Seger}} [[Category:Bob Seger albums]] [[Category:1995 albums]] [[Category:Capitol Records albums]]
